did.unittitle: Xavier in the News newspaper clippings collection
did.abstract: A news clipping file done by the Xavier University Office of Marketing and Public Relations. These news clippings appeared in various publications, both locally and nationally. This file was meant for internal referral and use by the Xavier community.

bioghist.head: History of Xavier in the News
bioghist.p: This clipping file was done by the Xavier University Office of Marketing and Public Relations. Begun in 1992, it is unclear when this clipping file was discontinued. Some clipping files have an alternate title "Have You Heard the News?" Other segments bear the title "Xavier University Sports Information." The Xavier University Office of Sports Information was also given as an additional source for some files.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: A news clipping file of various Xavier University-related topics appearing in different publications.
